titleStmt.title: The life and death of Pompey the Great with all his glorious victories and triumphs : as also the Life and death of Artaxerxes Mnemon, one of the great Persian emperours / by Sa. Clarke, sometime pastor in St. Bennet Finck London.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped and stained, with loss of text.
"Life and death of Artaxerxes Mnemon" not included in this copy.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
